name: EightBitAlarm
0:
”Alexa, wake me up at 7:00 AM to eight bit alarm tone”
”Alexa, set an alarm at 7:00 AM to eight bit alarm tone”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: eight bit alarm
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Do you live and breathe video games? Now you can feel like you're waking up in a video game every day! 
Classic 8-BIT sounds like coin-collecting, explosions, jumps, power-ups, level-ups, and everyone's favorite: FAIL!

LEARN MORE:
Created by Volley - the makers of the hit Alexa games Song Quiz, Yes Sire, Popcorn Tycoon, and Bedtime Stories.
priv: Your requests to this skill are not shared with the skill developer.
